programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep6
programme.desc: Kung Boov / Werewolves Of Chicago - Tip teaches Oh her version of kung fu so he can stand up to a bully/Oh finds a real wolf to teach him how to become a werewolf for Halloween.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep6
programme.desc: Garby - Just as Ty Rux welcomes Garby, a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus, to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang embarks on a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key; but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.desc: Cake - Hattie needs help to bake a cake - and Stan's on his way! No challenge is too small or too unusual, and Stan's always happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep27
programme.desc: I Am Monty - Monty doesn't think he is similar to anyone else in his family and wonders whether everyone in a family should be alike.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep22
programme.desc: It's Time for a Canal Walk - JoJo and Gran Gran are enjoying a canal walk when they meet Ned and Monty, who need some help - Ned has lost the lock key, causing a canal traffic jam. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Explorers - While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep28
programme.desc: The Space Badge - Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - Duggee explains why animals all have different voices.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep26
programme.desc: The Obstacle Course Badge - The squirrels compete in the annual Animal Obstacle Course Race.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Blarney Stone, Ireland - Kyan has to use some smooth talking to save the tourists and protect Blarney Castle.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Fig - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the nicest, kindest, Fig, performing his song, "Just Can't Help Being Sweet!"

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Apple - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Apple singing in celebration of her great-great-grandad, Apple Tree's, 100th birthday.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Not So Supertato - Evil Pea tricks Supertato into believing he has no superpowers without his red cape. When he rescues his friends without his cape he discovers he has superpowers cape or no cape!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Super Secret - Evil Pea traps Supertato and demands he tell her the secret of his super strength. Supertato escapes and tells Evil Pea that his friends give him his super strength.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Tiddly Phone - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po receive a call on the Tubby Phone. It's the Tiddlytubbies who ring to say hello, just before the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep18
programme.desc: R - Dee encourages a friend to say 'r', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We roar, dance like a robot and see a rainbow!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Mr Bobby Bunny Bag - The friends enjoy a day out in the forest and Hooper brings his favourite pyjama case.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Messy Music - Messy and friends must play the OKIDO concert. It's time for OKIDO to make some noise.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Turtle Boy - Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Blarney Stone, Ireland - Kyan has to use some smooth talking to save the tourists and protect Blarney Castle.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep34
programme.desc: The Dump - On a trip to the Dump, Dad claims he's the best at everything. But Bluey discovers that Dad's throwing out her old drawing and questions if he really is the best Dad in the world.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Trampoline - When Dad has to stop having fun with the girls and go to work, Bluey and Bingo scramble to keep him playing games with them on the trampoline!

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Hitching a ride - Andy Day takes a look at how young animals get a ride. In Madagascar, ring-tailed lemurs get a piggyback from mum.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep7
programme.desc: What's For Lunch? - Carnotaurus is hungry, but what should he have for his lunch? Brachiosaurus, baryonyx and T-Rex help him find out what his sharp teeth are for.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Mission: Missing Map - Annie is in a kayak, but she's lost her map and is totally lost. She's cold and wet and has hurt her wrist. At the Woofton Search and Rescue Centre, Tom and Meagaidh need to find Annie, and fast!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep8
programme.desc: The Pirate Inspector - A mysterious Pirate Inspector is coming to visit Captain Captain and the pirates. If they fail the inspection, they will get a huge fine. But they soon suspect the Inspector is someone they know!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A big box is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are very excited.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - When Roly surprises Duggee, Duggee jumps and drops his cup, which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: Why the pill was NOT invented to give women freedom - This tiny pill was a revolution, promising the end of unwanted pregnancies. It introduced an era of family planning and sexual freedom. But were women really liberated by it? Today, women on every continent use the contraceptive pill. Well show you the dark side of the pill - and we're not talking about the health risks.

programme.desc: How did the GDR State Security operate? We find out in Berlin! - The Ministry for State Security, or Stasi for short, was the GDR's secret police. programme.desc: Lithuanias youth is the happiest in Europe - but WHY?! - Lithuania topped the World Happiness Report in 2024 in #happiness of people below the age of 30.
